data.title: David Murray
data.text: Mr. David Murray is a commercially astute professional with over 35 years experience in the construction and civil engineering industry across the UK, Asian and Australian markets. Mr. Murrayâ€™s industry experience includes contractual and commercial advice, commercial management, quantity surveying, claims management, dispute mitigation and resolution, financial reporting, project auditing and reviews and cashflow management. He has acted as a Tier 1 commercial lead on significant Government Infrastructure tenders across civil and rail and metro projects. Through this interaction, Mr. Murray has developed a clear understanding of the perception of issues and drivers on both sides of the transactional fence.
